mapper.select:
SELECT t.* FROM jeegem_base_role t WHERE 1=1
AND t.orgId IN (${param.allOrgIds})
AND (t.name like CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') )
AND t.isValid=#{param.isValid}
ORDER BY t.createTime
SELECT count(*) FROM jeegem_base_role t WHERE 1=1

SELECT jbre.id as id, jbre.name as name, jbre.parentId as pId, (CASE WHEN jbor.role_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'true' ELSE '' END) as checked, (CASE WHEN jbre.isValid=1 and jbor.role_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'true' ELSE '' END) as open, (CASE WHEN jbre.isValid!=1 or jbor.th_org_Id IS NULL THEN 'true' ELSE '' END) as chkDisabled FROM jeegem_BASE_RESOURCES jbre LEFT JOIN (SELECT thjbor.org_Id as th_org_Id, thjbor.resources_id as resources_id, tjbrr.role_id as role_Id FROM jeegem_base_org_resources thjbor LEFT JOIN (SELECT t.role_id,t.resources_id FROM jeegem_base_role_resources t where t.role_id=#{roleId}) tjbrr ON thjbor.resources_id=tjbrr.resources_id WHERE thjbor.org_Id in (SELECT t.orgId FROM jeegem_base_role t WHERE t.id=#{roleId})) jbor ON jbor.resources_id=jbre.id WHERE jbre.layer=#{layer} ORDER BY jbre.parentId,jbre.type,jbre.sort
mapper.delete: DELETE from jeegem_base_role_resources WHERE role_id=#{roleId} AND EXISTS (SELECT jbr.id FROM jeegem_base_resources jbr WHERE resources_id=jbr.id AND jbr.layer=#{layer})
